tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    congestion_level INT,
    road_closure BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(255),
    closure_reason VARCHAR(255),
    closure_start_date DATE,
    closure_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE congestion_levels (
    location VARCHAR(255),
    congestion_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    road_name VARCHAR(255),
    closure_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE map_interface (
    map_id INT,
    map_image BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE congestion_levels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(255),
    closure_reason VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE map_interface_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_id INT,
    map_url VARCHAR(255),
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_updates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT,
    update_text TEXT,
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE congestion_levels (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  congestion_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR(255),
  closure_reason VARCHAR(255),
  closure_start_date DATE,
  closure_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE map_interface (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  map_location VARCHAR(255),
  map_image_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(255),
  incident_description TEXT,
  incident_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_location VARCHAR(255),
  camera_url VARCHAR(255)
)
